title: Spotted: A New Specialized Diverge at Unbound Gravel Seems Right Around the Corner
content:
Spotted via Instagram, this new Diverge gravel bike looks a whole lot like the current one, with enough key changes to make us think there's something new coming soon.

Read the full article at Spotted: A New Specialized Diverge at Unbound Gravel Seems Right Around the Corner on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
